page.title: 13Land usage around Pool Hayes
page.content: We walked along the canal where we saw a grey signet.The first bridge we saw was Perry Hall bridge which is about 40 years old.Then we went down Wyrley Road and I was surprised to see how neglected the canal was.There are not many facilities for young people like myself.There was a playground for children but there was only a couple of swings,a slide and a climbing frame which did not look very safe. I think that there are too many houses on the estate and that some of the land should have been used for shops,a youth club or even just an open area where children could play in safety.Pool Hayes Community School is also on the estate,this is the school which I shall be going to eventually.
